00119 
00120 int main(void)
00121 {
00122    wdtdrv_disable();
00123    Clear_prescaler();
00124    scheduler();
00125    return 0;
00126 }
00127 
00131 #ifdef  __GNUC__
00132 // Locate low level init function before RAM init (init3 section)
00133 // and remove std prologue/epilogue
00134 char __low_level_init(void) __attribute__ ((section (".init3"),naked));
00135 #endif
00136 
00137 #ifdef __cplusplus
00138 extern "C" {
00139 #endif
00140 char __low_level_init()
00141 {
00142   Clear_prescaler();
00143   return 1;
00144 }
00145 #ifdef __cplusplus
00146 }
